subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: While the jurors in the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse trial deliberated, Sandusky’s lawyer said he would be shocked if his client was acquitted on all 48 counts of abusing young boys that he faces.
snippet: While the jurors in the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse trial deliberated, Sandusky’s lawyer said he would be shocked if his client was acquitted on all 48 counts of abusing young boys that he faces.
